rows.label: qev055802_MSG0001
rows.name:
Phew! Any longer and I would have been dissolved in
its rising digestive juices.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055802_MSG0002
rows.name: It seems this trial is...a failure.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055802_MSG0003
rows.name:
Hmm. And yet, I was quite thorough in my research.
Did my incense differ from the traditional Prone recipe
somehow?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055802_JNK0010
rows.name: Notice

rows.label: qev055802_SEL0011
rows.name:
Remark on how unfazed Min'barac
is despite what just happened.

rows.label: qev055802_JNK0020
rows.name: Suggest

rows.label: qev055802_SEL0021
rows.name: Tell Min'barac that he should ask a Prone for advice.

rows.label: qev055802_MSG0004
rows.name:
Panicking does nothing to enhance one's chances of
survival.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055802_MSG0005
rows.name:
We Orphe do not indulge in such unproductive
emotional states.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055802_MSG0006
rows.name:
I find the matter of why my incense failed to work much
more pressing.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055802_MSG0007
rows.name:
And since I included all available data in my work,
I suppose there is nothing left now but to ask the
Prone directly.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055802_MSG0008
rows.name:
I suppose there is nothing left but that. No amount of
secondhand data will equal a firsthand account.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055802_MSG0009
rows.name:
But they are so...huge. And they served as the
Ganglion's foot soldiers, which makes them
professionally violent.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055802_MSG0010
rows.name:
I feel more trepidation about speaking to one of them
than I did approaching that beast.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055802_JNK0030
rows.name: Assure

rows.label: qev055802_SEL0031
rows.name: Tell Min'barac that the Prone in NLA are friendly.

rows.label: qev055802_JNK0040
rows.name: Scare

rows.label: qev055802_SEL0041
rows.name:
Tell Min'barac that there's a good chance
they'll beat him into a squishy pulp.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055802_MSG0011
rows.name:
I suppose that must be true, else they could not
successfully cohabitate with you humans.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055802_MSG0012
rows.name: Absolutely terrifying! Have they harmed you, then?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055802_MSG0013
rows.name: But even so, I must know the secrets of their rite.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055802_MSG0014
rows.name:
I have made my decision. I will return to the Ma-non
ship and speak with the Prone.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055802_MSG0015
rows.name:
Until now, fear of contact with hostile races who lack
Ovah has led me to keep my distance.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055802_MSG0016
rows.name:
But I cannot afford to be timid any longer.
I WILL take command of that beast. I must![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055802_MSG0017
rows.name: Nh...nggh...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055802_MSG0018
rows.name: Is that Min'barac? What happened?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055802_MSG0019
rows.name:
Ugh. Were you eaten again? I had bad feeling in gut.
It seems I was right.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055802_MSG0020
rows.name:
Hey! Min'barac! Open your eyes!
This is no place to die.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055802_MSG0021
rows.name:
You probably don't need to panic, I don't think?
It looks to me like he was just very very surprised
and ended up fainting.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055802_MSG0022
rows.name: Tikotiko not buy that! Noborata always make stuff up![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055802_MSG0023
rows.name: Ah, but look! Friend is waking up...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055802_MSG0024
rows.name: Oh... H-hello, everyone. What happened?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055802_MSG0025
rows.name:
Min'barac got gobbled up again! Friend really need to
give up on crazy scheme already.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055802_MSG0026
rows.name: But I need strength to survive on Mira...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055802_MSG0027
rows.name:
You have friends to help.
If someone threatens you, I will beat them.
If you need answers, Noborata will give them.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055802_MSG0028
rows.name: And Tikotiko can...er...lend money?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055802_MSG0029
rows.name:
Why does Tikotiko sound like afterthought?!
...Though perhaps small loan not out of the question.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055802_MSG0030
rows.name: I do not know what to say...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055802_MSG0031
rows.name:
Thank you all. We have only just recently met,
yet you have shown me such kindness.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055802_MSG0032
rows.name:
No. We have done nothing yet.
Human is the one you should thank.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055802_MSG0033
rows.name: I assume you saved me, [ST:playername ]?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055802_MSG0034
rows.name:
Thanks to you, I was able to see my wonderful friends
again. Please accept this in thanks.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055802_MSG0035
rows.name:
It is strange. None of them possess an Ovah,
and yet I feel a warmth as if they did.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055802_MSG0036
rows.name: I have no word to describe this feeling. Do you?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055802_JNK0050
rows.name: Answer

rows.label: qev055802_SEL0051
rows.name: Call it the bond of friendship.

rows.label: qev055802_JNK0060
rows.name: Dismiss

rows.label: qev055802_SEL0061
rows.name:
Tell Min'barac that there's no need to treat
a swell of emotions as anything special.

rows.label: qev055802_MSG0037
rows.name: Friendship... Yes, that feels right.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055802_MSG0038
rows.name: I feel a strong bond with you as well.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055802_MSG0039
rows.name:
You speak like an Orphean who has lost his Ovah.
A dry, empty husk...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055802_MSG0040
rows.name:
I think you are mistaken. What I feel for these people—
and for yourself—is no passing agitation.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055802_MSG0041
rows.name:
Good! We have new friend.
We need proper welcome.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055802_MSG0042
rows.name:
We will go back to city. Think about future together.
New LA will be our home for while to come.
We must find something for you to do there![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055802_MSG0043
rows.name:
I am starting to feel that even someone as powerless as
me can be of use, so long as I am with you all.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055802_MSG0044
rows.name:
Ha ha! Good! Then we go home and begin planning.
Get walking, everyone. You too, Min'barac![ST:wait ]
